Summary: LIGHT APPEARED GOING SOUTH TO NORTH ORANGE PULSATING
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Juno Beach
There were no other sightings in Juno Beach on or around April 3rd 2012
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy husband watching tv in front of by window first saw the orange light coming from south to north, pulsating. Went out with camera and observes light still moving same direction then hovered and disappeared. Took a short movie but quality is poor. Then second light appeared same direction color and MO. Light also disappeared as other one did. I observed an helicopter flying same path right after second light disappeared. Lights had no noise and was a bright orange &pulsating. Helicopter was very loud. I was very excited and shaking all at once. I am used to planes flying over my area towards palm beach airport. this was completely different objects without blinking or engine noise. Also quite big compare to an approaching plane.
